*div1 type="summary"* *p*Resolutions of the convention against the African slave trade, April 4, 1833.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Convention Room, San Felipe De Austin.*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-04-1833">Thursday, April 4, 1833.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*On motion of *person_mentioned*David G. Burnet*/person_mentioned*, it was*/p*
*p*Resolved; That, whereas it has been reported to this Convention, that a vessel under foreign colours has recently arrived in, and de- parted from the *location_mentioned*Bay of Galveston*/location_mentioned*; that she came direct from the *location_mentioned*Island of Cuba*/location_mentioned*, and was laden with *person_mentioned*negroes*/person_mentioned*.— And whereas it has also been stated, that these unfortunate beings are recently from the *location_mentioned*African Coast*/location_mentioned*, and speak only their vernacular tongue. The *person_mentioned*Convention */person_mentioned*do hold in utter abhorrence all participation, whether direct, or indirect, in the African *person_mentioned*Slave */person_mentioned*Trade—that we do concur in the general indignation which has been manifested throughout the *location_mentioned*civilized world*/location_mentioned* against that inhuman and unprincipled traffic. And we do, therefore, earnestly recommend to our constituents, the good *person_mentioned*people of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, that they will not only abstain from all concern in that abominable traffic, but that they will unite their efforts to prevent the evil from polluting our shores; and will aid and sustain the civil authority in detecting and punishing any similar attempt for the future.*/p*
*p*Resolved, That the *location_mentioned*Island of Cuba*/location_mentioned*, as pertaining to the *location_mentioned*Kingdom of Spain*/location_mentioned*, is an *location_mentioned*enemies country*/location_mentioned*, and by necessary consequence, all commercial, or other intercourse with it, or its *person_mentioned*inhabitants*/person_mentioned*, is an infraction of our most sacred duties as good and faithful *person_mentioned*citizens of the *location_mentioned*Mexican Republic*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Therefore, This *person_mentioned*Convention */person_mentioned*would advise, and enjoin upon all the good *person_mentioned*people of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, that they discountenance by all possible means, every attempt to fix upon the moral and political character of our young *location_mentioned*community */location_mentioned*the odious epithet of treason, or the still more detestable stigma of Piracy.*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Convention */person_mentioned*feel a proud satisfaction in believing that the late shameful violation of law, and of every patriotic duty, was perpetrated by transient *person_mentioned*foreign adventurers*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*On motion of *person_mentioned*Ira Ingram*/person_mentioned*, seconded by *person_mentioned*Thomas Hastings*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Ordered, That the resolution, relative to the introduction of *person_mentioned*African negroes from the*location_mentioned* Island of Cuba*/location_mentioned*, or *location_mentioned*elsewhere*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, and relative to the prosecution of commerce with the *location_mentioned*Island*/location_mentioned*, be signed by the *person_mentioned*President and Secretary of this Convention*/person_mentioned*, and be published in the *location_mentioned*Texas Advocate*/location_mentioned*, and transmitted to *location_mentioned*New-Orleans*/location_mentioned* for publication in the papers of that city; and also to the several*location_mentioned* presses of Mexico*/location_mentioned*, for publication throughout the*location_mentioned* Mexican Republic*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*W. H. Wharton, Chairman*/person_mentioned*.*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Thos. Hastings, Secretary,*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
